title: Ananda sutantaram
sahitya:
Ananda sutantaram vENDum en anbu naTabhairavi aruviyAip-perugavE


anupallavi

  vAna veLiyinilE gAnap-paravai pOlE jnAna veLiyinilE nAnum parandulAva


caraNam    nOvum tuyar palavum mEvum paDu kuzhiyil jIvanait-taLLuvadO narajanmattai eLLuvadO 
kUvum kuyilazhagaik-kurangin kai koDuppadO konjum kiLiyaippulik-kUNDil aDaippadO
